Title: Nakado Riku Animation: Hijouyou Mochidashi Bukuro wo Youi Shiyou
Description: ['For the 8th anniversary of the Great East Japan Earthquake, Fukushima Prefecture support character Nakado Riku and her friends teach us how to prepare an earthquake survival kit.']
Related: ['Prequel: Naniwa Yuukyouden: Kyouretsu! Ana ga Attara Iretai-hen']
